def_cn: (批评那些不满诸如新道路、住宅区或监狱建在居住地附近的人们)邻避效应，“别在我家后院”观点
def_en: If you say that someone has a nimby attitude, you are criticizing them because they do not want something such as a new road, housing estate, or prison built near to where they live. Nimby is an abbreviation for (缩略=) 'not in my backyard'.
